column4: Is there any script that will give me the feed by inserting the original url one by one from a text file?
I want to collect feeds from different sites but I only have the url.
no, you need to go to the site and find the feed url for that site
just bookmark them into your bookmark bar until you have them all, then look at their properties in firefox
Are you sure? In Google Reader there i an option to add feed by entering the url, but then I have to add them one by one, I want to ad them as a list at once.
well, you'd need to collect the feeds into one area in order to ad them at once
